text: Abbott Elementary is an American mockumentary sitcom television series created by Quinta Brunson for ABC. It stars Brunson, Tyler James Williams, Janelle James, Lisa Ann Walter, Chris Perfetti, William Stanford Davis, and Sheryl Lee Ralph. The series premiered on December 7, 2021 to positive reviews from critics. The show has been nominated for 24 Primetime Emmy Awards, winning four including Outstanding Lead Actress in a Comedy Series for Brunson. Abbott Elementary has also won three Golden Globe Awards, with acting wins for Brunson and Williams and the Golden Globe Award for Best Television Series â€“ Musical or Comedy in 2023. In January 2023, the series was renewed for a third season, which premiered on February 7, 2024 and season four was released on October 9, 2024. On January 21, 2025, it was announced that Abbott Elementary was renewed for a fifth season. ==References== Category:Emmy Award winning programs Category:Golden Globe Award winning programs Category:2020s American sitcoms
title: Abbott Elementary
